name: Ubiquiti | AirOS | Security | Authentication | Login (SYSLOG)
description: Jan 12 03:11:10 dropbear[12784]: password auth succeeded for 'Admin' from 10.200.201.137:19553

patterns.value_re: .* dropbear\[\d+\]: password auth succeeded for '(?P<user>\S+)' from (?P<ip>\S+):\d+$

name: Ubiquiti | AirOS | Security | Authentication | Logout (SYSLOG)
description: Jan 12 03:19:28 dropbear[13418]: exit after auth (Admin): Exited normally

patterns.value_re: .* dropbear\[\d+\]: exit after auth \((?P<user>\w+)\): Exited normally$
